title: How to know if I have a broadband or not at home - Quora

response.answer_text: if you are the bill player I would hope you know what you ordered.have a look at any correspondence you may have received if it was paperless and are computer savvy log on to your account and check the details for the service you are receiving. If that fails telephone customer service and check with them. Look at the rear of the computer, if there is a telephone cable you have a very old internet service. If there is a cable going to another box and the cables look like television cables you probably have fiber broadband.Note what is written on the box it can be identified to say whether it's broadband or cable.On the computer there is a network and internet sharing menu.this will also contain information on hardware and speeds.
